channel.title: Default files on
channel.description: Recent content in Default files on

item.title: Default files
item.description: The --defaults option may be used to specify a package of options. Here is a sample defaults file demonstrating all of the fields that may be used: from: markdown+emoji # reader: may be used instead of from: to: html5 # writer: may be used instead of to: # leave blank for output to stdout: output-file: # leave blank for input from stdin, use [] for no input: input-files: - preface.md - content.
